name: SKDownload
desc: Downloadable content associated with a product.

items.name: var expectedContentLength: Int64
items.desc: The length of the downloadable content, in bytes.

items.name: var contentIdentifier: String
items.desc: A string that uniquely identifies the downloadable content.

items.name: var contentVersion: String
items.desc: A string that identifies which version of the content is available for download.

items.name: var transaction: SKPaymentTransaction
items.desc: The transaction associated with the downloadable file.

items.name: var state: SKDownloadState
items.desc: The current state of the download object.

items.name: var progress: Float
items.desc: A value that indicates how much of the file has been downloaded.

items.name: var timeRemaining: TimeInterval
items.desc: An estimated time, in seconds, to finish downloading the content.

items.name: var SKDownloadTimeRemainingUnknown: TimeInterval
items.desc: Indicates that the system cannot determine how much time is needed to finish downloading the content.

items.name: enum SKDownloadState
items.desc: The states that a download operation can be in.

items.name: var error: Error?
items.desc: The error that prevented the content from being downloaded.

items.name: var contentURL: URL?
items.desc: The local location of the downloaded file.

items.name: class func contentURL(forProductID: String) -> URL?
items.desc: Returns the local location for the previously downloaded flie.
